problem: 如图,△ABC内接于⊙O,AD是⊙O的直径,∠ABC=35°,则∠CAD的度数是().
answer: 试题分析:根据圆周角定理,得∠ADC=∠ABC=35°,再根据AD是⊙O的直径,则∠ACD=90°,由三角形的内角和定理即可求得∠CAD的度数.∵∠ABC=35°,∴∠ADC=35°,∵AD是⊙O的直径,∴∠ACD=90°,∴∠CAD=90°-35°=55°.故选C.
problem_en: As shown in the figure, △ABC is inscribed in ⊙O, AD is the diameter of ⊙O, ∠ABC = N_0, then the degree of ∠CAD is ().
